name: Raphael Ryder Cheshire International Centre for the Relief of Suffering

address: PO Box 157, Mohini Road End, Trans Rispana Nadi

briefDescription: Established in 1959. Mission- Provide relief to the suffering. Activities:-Provide a decent home to Leprosy Cured patients.Education, hostel facility and rehabilitation to children of Leprosy Parentage. Care, education, training and rehabilitation of children with intellectual disability.A Community Based Rehabilitation Programme for children and adults with intellectual and associated disabilities.A Mobile Outreach Programme in remote areas of Uttarakhand for children with intellectual and associated disabilities.  Assessment and remediation of children suffering from learning difficulty.Development of human resources in the field of disability. Conduct of courses recognised by Rehabilitation Council of India. 26 Bed TB Hospital and OPD for treatment of TB patients including Drug Resistant patients. Registered with the National Trust (NT). Appointed by NT as the State Nodal Agency Centre for Uttarakhand dealing with Autism, Cerebral Palsy, Mental Retardation and Multiple Disabilities. Awarded ‘Best NGO Award-2011’ by the NT.Declared as one of the top four NGOs in the medium category by sponsors of India NGO Award, in 2012-13.
